name: Brotherhood of Steel Name Generator
description: Ready to join the Brotherhood and protect humanity? But first, you need a name worthy of a Knight, Paladin, or Elder! This generator crafts the perfect moniker for your post-apocalyptic persona.
introduction: The Brotherhood of Steel stands as a beacon of technology and order in a world ravaged by nuclear fire. Your name is your identity, your reputation, and your legacy within the Brotherhood. Let's forge a name that strikes fear into the hearts of mutants and ghouls!
howToUse: Click the 'Generate' button – it's like summoning the power of a fusion core!
Behold! A name worthy of the Brotherhood appears before your very eyes.
Don't like it? Generate again! We have more names than a Scribe has holotapes.
Found the perfect name? Copy it and spread the glory of the Brotherhood across the wasteland!
Remember, a strong name means a strong reputation. Choose wisely, Initiate!

faqs.question: Will this generator make me a Paladin?
faqs.answer: While a cool name is a good start, becoming a Paladin requires dedication, skill, and a healthy dose of radiation resistance. But hey, looking the part is half the battle!

faqs.question: Are these names lore-friendly?
faqs.answer: We've done our best to capture the spirit of the Brotherhood. Some names might sound familiar, others might be brand new. Use your best judgement, Knight!

faqs.question: Can I use these names for other characters?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! The wasteland is your oyster (a very radioactive oyster, mind you). Feel free to adapt these names for any character you like.

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the names?
faqs.answer: Keep generating! We've got a vast database of potential names. If all else fails, combine parts of different names or add your own personal touch.

faqs.question: Is the Brotherhood of Steel evil?
faqs.answer: That's a matter of perspective, Initiate. We believe in preserving technology and protecting humanity. Some may disagree with our methods, but our intentions are pure...mostly.

faqs.question: Can I suggest names for the generator?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! The Brotherhood is always looking for new recruits, and new names. Send us your ideas, and we might just add them to the generator!
